headline.main: Camera Man, Back From Orient, Says Time Is Not Ripe for Victory; Ted Genock Tells of Two Years on Fighting Fronts Around Globe and Thinks Decision May Come in Crimea

lead_paragraph: Ted Genock, Paramount Newsreel photographer, who hasn't slept more than two nights in the same bed in the last two years of his war coverage, said yesterday upon his return to New York that he had come back from Java and Australia because the time was not yet ripe in that sector for pictures of "Jerry and the Jap getting kicked in the pants."
